rooms.name: The Tower Gates
rooms.description:
You are at the entrance to a tall tower.  Lightning flashes periodically and
it is raining.  You think it might be a good idea to turn back into the grove.

north.description: You see a large steel gate.  Beyond is the Foyer of the Tower.

extra_descriptions.description: The gate is tall and secure.  Whoever built it values privacy.

rooms.name: The Foyer
rooms.description:
This is the entrance to the Tower.  The hallway continues to the north,
leading towards a staircase.  You notice a grim painting on the wall,  and
quickly look away.

extra_descriptions.description:
This painting depicts the grisly death of a foolish human.  You hope you do
not share his fate.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description:
This hallway seems to stretch on forever.  You notice a stairway in
the distance.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: You trudge down the hallway.  You notice doors to the east and west.

east.description: You see a door.  You notice a sign.

west.description: You see an oak door.  There is an inscription on it.

extra_descriptions.description: The sign says "NURSERY" in bold letters.

rooms.name: Nursery
rooms.description:
It looks like a tornado has been through here.  Toys are scattered everywhere,
and a small group of dragon hatchlings are fighting over a bone.

east.description: You see a large stone door.

rooms.name: Storage Room
rooms.description: This room is covered with dust, it looks as if no one has been here in ages.

extra_descriptions.description: As you look closely at the dust, you notice the outline of a trapdoor!

rooms.name: End of the Hallway
rooms.description:
You have finally reached the end of the hallway.  A huge staircase leads up.
You see a sign at the base of the staircase.

extra_descriptions.description:
The sign reads:
This area is kind of tough.  You probably shouldn't go up these stairs
alone if you are under 18th level, or at all if you under 14th level.
Have fun! -- Wench

rooms.name: Guardian's Room
rooms.description:
You climb down the rickety stairs and find yourself face to face with a
gargantuan hydra.  How fast can you climb UP stairs?

rooms.name: The Treasure Room
rooms.description:
You have made it past the hydra into the vault.  You are astounded by
the treasure here.  Not only are you now rich, you can probably rest here
safely.  The west wall seems to have a large door made entirely of ruby.

rooms.name: The Second Floor
rooms.description:
You have made it up to the second floor.  You hear hissing and see several
dragon men rushing you.  You wonder how long you will be staying here.

rooms.name: The Court
rooms.description:
You have entered what seems to be a large court.  The people guarding it
don't seem happy to see you ...

rooms.name: Hall O' Pleasure
rooms.description:
You stop dead in your tracks as you enter this ornately decorated room - it
is populated with the king's harem.

rooms.name: The Court
rooms.description: You are continuing down the hall.  To the east and west you see ornate doors.

rooms.name: The Library
rooms.description:
You have entered a huge room, filled with books.  A peaceful man is
sitting at a table, studying.

rooms.name: The Sanctum
rooms.description:
This small room is modestly decorated with small dragon icons.  Its sole
occupant is deep in thought.

rooms.name: The Court Ends
rooms.description:
You have reached the end of the court.  A huge Draconian is sitting in a
chair here.  As you enter, he motions with his hand and you are rushed by three
of his bodyguards.

rooms.name: bedroom
rooms.description: This is the personal room of the draconian king.  It is not empty.

rooms.name: Entrance to the Crypt
rooms.description:
You have entered a large room which smells heavily of reptile.  You wonder
what awaits you here.

rooms.name: Crypt
rooms.description:
You are in a large room which continues to the west.  You notice many
coffins here.  Open coffins reveal remains of something other than man.
The smell of reptile is very strong here.

rooms.name: The Lair
rooms.description:
You have entered a large room dominated by a great white dragon.  It growls
at you before it attacks.

rooms.name: A Lair
rooms.description:
You have entered a large room dominated by a great black dragon.  It looks
as though it is amused by your presence.

rooms.name: The Crypt Ends
rooms.description:
You have come to the end of the Crypt.  It seems deserted.  There is a
strange coffin lying against the wall.

extra_descriptions.description: A coffin lies a against the east wall.  It is closed.

rooms.name: Entrance to the Great Hall
rooms.description:
You have entered a huge hall.  It has been carefully decorated with
beautiful tapestries depicting a great battle between dragons and men.  The
dragons appear to be the victors.

rooms.name: The Great Hall
rooms.description:
You are working your way down the Hall.  To the north, you notice a smaller
passageway, while the main hall continues to the east.

rooms.name: A Narrow Passageway
rooms.description: This Passageway branches off from the main hall and leads somewhere ... where?

north.description: You see a large Lair.  It looks dangerous.

rooms.name: Lair
rooms.description:
You have entered a large lair with bones strewn about the ground.  You
notice the source of these as you come face to face with a rather large red
dragon.  You notice a trap door in the floor.

rooms.name: Underground Tunnel
rooms.description:
You have entered an underground tunnel.  It is dark and dirty, and you find
yourself wishing you were back in Midgaard.

up.description: You see the red dragon's lair.

rooms.name: Underground Tunnel
rooms.description: This tunnel has come to a dead end.  You feel nervous about being trapped here.

rooms.name: The Great Hall Ends.
rooms.description:
You have come to the end of the great hall.  You see before you a huge
golden door, it must be at least twenty feet tall!  It has beautiful etchings
of dragons.  You see a sign on the door.

east.description: You see a great golden door.

extra_descriptions.description:
Congratulations on making it this far!  Watch out, it gets a little
nasty here... :) - Wench

rooms.name: THE Lair
rooms.description: You have entered a huge lair.  You feel that something big lives here or at least did.  The golden door lies back to the west.

west.description: You see a great golden door.

rooms.name: The End...
rooms.description:
You have reached the final lair.  It is dominated by a huge five headed
dragon.  You suddenly realize that you have SERIOUS problems...

south.description: You see the top of the mountain.

rooms.name: Stairwell
rooms.description:
This is an old decrepit stairwell that leads to the wine cellar.  It looks
like it hasn't been used for decades.  Well, at least not by anything living.

rooms.name: Wine cellar
rooms.description:
This is the old wine cellar of the Dragon Tower.  The shelves are empty.
Nothing living has been in here for a long time.  You see a tunnel leading
off to the east and boy does it smell bad.  Kinda of like rotting flesh.

rooms.name: Tunnel
rooms.description:
This tunnel seems to stretch for miles.  You try to distinguish the end but
your eyes soon tire from the strain.  The smell here has increased two fold.
The tunnel continues to go to the east.  The wine cellar lies back to the
west.

rooms.name: A cave opening
rooms.description:
You stand at the opening of a giant cave.  There are many bones strewn across
the room.  Some human, some indistinguishable.  It smells very bad in here.
You can hear movement in the cave to the north.  The tunnel goes back to the
south.

rooms.name: The End of the tunnel
rooms.description:
You have finally come to the end of the tunnel.  Back to the west lies
the miles of tunnels you have walked through.  You see the faint outline of
a trapdoor above you.  A bridge over an underground river lies to the south.

rooms.name: The Bridge
rooms.description:
You are walking along an old wooden bridge.  Its not that secure.  You
might want to hurry along.  To the south, on the other side of the bridge,
lies a small opening.

rooms.name: A small opening
rooms.description:
You are standing in a small opening.  To the north lies the old wooden
bridge.  To your south the you can see a clearing.  You can see sunlight
again.  What a welcome relief!

rooms.name: Clearing
rooms.description:
You stand out in a clearing.  Mountains are all around you.  There is a
well in the middle of the clearing.  Lying against the well is a sign.  A
path leads up the mountain.  The small opening is back to the north.

extra_descriptions.description:
The sign reads:
This is a bottomless pit cleverly disguised as a well.  People have
fallen in and never been heard from again.  Trust me, you don't want to go
down there.
The All Powerful Well Keeper

You peer over the side of the well.  It looks VERY, VERY deep.  It appears
to be ENDLESS.

rooms.name: A path
rooms.description:
This path leads up the side of the mountain.  A clearing lies below you.
There is a cave opening to the west.  The path continues up the mountain.

rooms.name: A cave opening
rooms.description:
You stand before a huge cave opening.  You hearing heavy breathing from
within the cave.  There are a few skeletons lying about.  The cave lies to
the south.  The path is back to the east.

rooms.name: The path continues
rooms.description:
The path continues up the mountain to the top.  The path also goes down.
Thats it, nothing more to see.

rooms.name: The top of the mountain
rooms.description:
You are standing at the top of the mountain.  It feels more like the top of
the world.  To your north lies a huge platinum door.  You hear very pronounced
grumbling from behind the doors.  It sounds like something huge and hungry.
But if you don't have the key you don't have to worry because you can't get in.
If you do have the key I would suggest not going in.  Some believe the Five
Headed dragon Tiamat was imprisoned here by the gods.  But who believes in
fairy tales.  Well, if you're scared, you can always go down the mountain.

extra_descriptions.description: A huge platinum door separates you from harm

rooms.name: Well
rooms.description:
O
h
!
N
o
!
I warned you!  You have fallen into the bottomless pit.  You life flashes
right before your eyes.  Pretty pathetic isn't it?  Next time you'll know
to listen to the God of Laughs.

mobiles.name: the dragon hatchling
mobiles.description: A dragon hatchling is here, chewing on a bone.

mobiles.name: the dragon master
mobiles.description: The lord of this crypt is here.

mobiles.name: a powerful mage
mobiles.description: A man is here, studying some books.

mobiles.name: the holy Draconian
mobiles.description: A Draconian is here, deep in thought.

mobiles.name: the Draconian King
mobiles.description: A Draconian wearing fine clothes is here, pondering his greatness.

mobiles.name: A bodyguard
mobiles.description: A bodyguard is here, staring at you menacingly.

mobiles.name: Tiamat
mobiles.description: A five headed dragon hisses at you as you enter this room.

mobiles.name: the Great Red Dragon
mobiles.description: A red dragon is here, contemplating your existence.

mobiles.name: the Great Black Dragon
mobiles.description: A black dragon is here, laughing at your insolence.

mobiles.name: the Great White Dragon
mobiles.description: A white dragon is here, waiting for you.

mobiles.name: the Ancient Green Dragon
mobiles.description: A green dragon is here, looking distraught.

mobiles.name: a large hydra
mobiles.description: A hydra is here, blocking the doorway.

mobiles.name: A human slave
mobiles.description: A Human slave is here, hard at work.

mobiles.name: a Draconian zombie
mobiles.description: A Draconian zombie is here, staring at nothing in particular.

mobiles.name: the phase dragon
mobiles.description: A Phase Dragon is darting around the room.

mobiles.name: the draconian fool
mobiles.description: A Fool is here, making fun of you.

mobiles.name: the Draconian Queen
mobiles.description: A Female Draconian sits, here, looking very important.

objects.name: a jagged spear
objects.description: A jagged spear has been left here.

objects.name: a silver dagger
objects.description: A silver dagger is lying here.

objects.name: a dragon's tooth knife
objects.description: A dangerous looking knife made from a dragon's tooth has been left here.

objects.name: a dragon skin bracelet
objects.description: A scaly bracelet lies on the ground.

objects.name: a black silk belt
objects.description: A black belt made of the finest silk is hanging here.

objects.name: a white silk belt
objects.description: A white belt made of the finest silk is hanging here.

objects.name: a platinum bracelet.
objects.description: A tarnished platinum bracelet has been dropped here.

objects.name: a holy symbol
objects.description: A golden holy symbol is here.

objects.name: a plain black robe
objects.description: A black robe is hanging on a hook on the wall.

objects.name: an emerald sword
objects.description: An emerald long sword is leaning against the wall.

objects.name: a stone club
objects.description: A heavy looking stone club is here.

objects.name: a diamond ring
objects.description: A diamond ring lies gleaming on the ground.

objects.name: a copper ring
objects.description: A copper ring is here.

objects.name: a steel key
objects.description: A steel key.

objects.name: a ruby key
objects.description: A ruby key.

objects.name: a white key
objects.description: A white key.

objects.name: a grey key
objects.description: A grey key is resting on the ground here.

objects.name: a stone key
objects.description: A stone key.

objects.name: a black key
objects.description: A black key.

objects.name: a platinum key
objects.description: A platinum key.

objects.name: a crested shield
objects.description: A large crested shield draws your attention.

objects.name: a golden wand
objects.description: A golden wand has been dropped here.

objects.name: a silver staff
objects.description: A silver staff.

objects.name: the staff of the dragon
objects.description: A powerful oak staff has been left here.

objects.name: scale mail
objects.description: A set of scale mail has been abandoned here.

objects.name: a black staff
objects.description: You notice the faint outline of a staff.

objects.name: a cyan potion
objects.description: A small cyan potion has been left here.

objects.name: a magenta potion
objects.description: A magenta potion.

objects.name: a pair of spiked gauntlets
objects.description: A pair of spiked gauntlets.

objects.name: a golden scimitar
objects.description: A golden scimitar.

objects.name: a diamond brooch
objects.description: A diamond brooch.

objects.name: a runed scroll
objects.description: A runed scroll.

objects.name: a pair of dragon skin gloves
objects.description: A pair of dragon skin gloves are lying on the ground.

objects.name: a helm of dragon kind
objects.description: A helm made of a dragon's skull is lying on the ground.

objects.name: a fur cloak
objects.description: A large mound of fur is lying here.

objects.name: a pair of dragon scale leggings
objects.description: A pair of dragon scale leggings is lying on the ground.

objects.name: a set of dragon scale sleeves
objects.description: A set of dragon scale sleeves is lying on the ground.

objects.name: a dragon tailed whip
objects.description: A dragon tailed whip is lying on the ground.

objects.name: a copper hammer
objects.description: A copper hammer is lying on the ground.

objects.name: a silver dagger
objects.description: A silver dagger is lying here.

objects.name: a tarnished gold key
objects.description: A tarnished gold key lies here.
